To build a $1M business you have to have: #5 synergy (synchronized energy, achieving more together) and #6 results
To build a $1M business you have to: #3 leverage (strengths/technology/collaboration) & #4 team (right people doing their best work) ...
To build a $1M business you have to: #1 have a level of core competency in what you do and #2 carve out a unique niche ...
